<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Wildfire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1059)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** 10-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Reflex

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A thin layer of ash and flame covers the ground in the area. The area becomes hazardous terrain. A creature that moves on the ground through the area takes 1 fire damage for every square of that area it moves into. A creature that ends its turn in the area must succeed at a Reflex save or take 1 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

 Each time you sustain this spell, the radius of the burst increases by 5 feet.

---
**Heightened (+2)** Increase the damage and persistent damage by 1.
name: Wildfire
